mapper.select: SELECT board_no boardNo, board_title boardTitle, board_cat_cd boardCatCd, user_id userId, c_date cDate, board_view boardView FROM board WHERE board_cat_cd = #{boardCatCd} ORDER BY c_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board WHERE board_cat_cd = #{boardCatCd}
SELECT dept_cd deptCd FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT b.board_no boardNo, b.board_title boardTitle, b.board_contents boardContents, b.user_id userId, b.c_date cDate, b.board_view boardView, bf.origin_filename, bf.path FROM board b left JOIN board_file bf ON b.board_no = bf.board_no WHERE b.board_no = #{boardNo}
